thread.title: Mr Niall Hetherington
thread.title_full: Life Style Sports reviewed by Mr Niall Hetherington

author: Mr Niall Hetherington
title: Mr Niall Hetherington
text: I had no intention of buying online as courier deliveries can be quite awkward to my location. I was pleasantly surprised to see the store collection option and found the entire process extremely hassle free. The staff member I dealt with in store was also quite pleasant and efficient.
